variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: GENEVA IDs were randomly assigned to all subjects included in the phenotype dataset. This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: CASE_STATUS
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
PLCO. Cancer in all age groups, other diseases in adults only, and methods (CADM)
EAGLE. Research related to smoking or lung disease (SLD)

variable.name: SUBJ_SOURCE
variable.description: Defines subject ID name space origin
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.comment: This study consists of two datasets, PLCO and Eagle, and you are currently looking at a combine variable from the PLCO and EAGLE datasets.
